data.actual_result: Keeps you in call with the disconnection sound playing on loop
data.expected_result: Discord closes and disconnects you from call
data.short_description: When you are in call and the internet goes out/ discord is shut down for a short while. The disconnection sound keeps going off repeatedly, and when you try to manually disconnect from call sometimes it takes a while to fully disconnect.
data.steps_to_repro: - Make it so you disconnect strait away. - only play the disconnection sound once.
